infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Copy That needs microphone access to record and share your voice stories with friends. Your audio recordings are the core feature of our social platform.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to take profile pictures
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Copy That needs gallery permission to pick and upload your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We need tracking permission to get analytics to improve the user experience.

plugins.photosPermission: Copy That would like access to your photos to upload a profile picture and personalize your account.

plugins.microphonePermission: Copy That needs microphone access to record and share your voice stories with friends. Your audio recordings are the core feature of our social platform.
